name: Purple Hen Country Lodge
description:
Purple Hen Country Lodge offers a relaxed, peaceful, quiet location.
Our tranquil 5 hectare property is nestled in the lower Kaimai ranges just 5 minutes away from Katikati.

We have a purpose-built lodge with 4 bedrooms (each sleeping up to 4 people),each with their own bathroom.
There is a large kitchen and dining area (with 4 fridges and ample food storage). The TV lounge has a 60 inch TV with DVD player, book exchange, jigsaw puzzles and board games.
Wood-fired Pizza Oven and Gas Barbecue for guests.
Free Wifi is unlimited and available in all rooms. Plenty of parking in our car park.
Enjoy seasonal greens, fruit and fresh eggs from our garden.
In our laundry room there is hanging space and a coin-operated washing machine and dryer.

groupInformation.terms: Under 18's should be accompanied by responsible adults
groupInformation.cancellationTerms: No refund for reduction in numbers.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
The Hiree agrees and will comply in total with the following conditions of hire:
1.	Towels and tea towels to be supplied by hirer.
2.	All rubbish to be placed in the rubbish bins provided – PROMPTLY
3.	All decorations to be removed unless prior approval has been obtained by the owners. Staples, nails or drawing pins are not to be used.
4.	Any hirer’s special requirements should be noted to the owners before hireage is agreed upon.
5.	Consume alcohol on the premises only in accordance with the provision of “The Sale and Supply of Alcohol Act (2012)”. 
EVENING FUNCTIONS TO END BY 10pm AND PREMISES TO BE VACATED BY 10am.
 The function should be run in an orderly manner and no loitering or disturbance should take place outside after 10pm. Please be aware that there are other guests staying at the Lodge who appreciate the quiet surroundings. We are not a party venue.
6.	 Premises, grounds and road frontage must be left clean and tidy. Cleaning must be completed by 10am the following day. 
7.	Any damage or losses caused to the Lodge or equipment will be repaired or replaced by tradesmen of the owner’s choosing and the cost recovered from the guest making the booking.
8.	A NO SMOKING policy is in force throughout the entire complex.
9.	Subletting is not permitted.
10.	No fires should be lit outside. 
11.	No picking of fruit. 
12.	Take full responsibility for the storage and protection of own equipment and property while staying at the Lodge.
13.	Health and Safety-Hirer/s must avoid any activity which places themselves, their guest or other attendees at risk of injury to themselves or others. In the event of the hirer/s becoming aware of any hazardous situation associated with the Lodge then such hazards must be isolated and the matter reported to the owners.
16.	Please note that your assistance in maintaining our Lodge in a clean and tidy situation is much appreciated.
17.	Fire Warden
As a condition of the block booking, the hirer/s agree to appoint a Fire Warden pursuant to the Fire Safety and Evacuation of Buildings Act 1992.

houseRules.notes:
Children: Supervised children under 16 are welcome.

Reception hours: are from 7am to 9am and 5pm to 7pm.

Check in after 5pm with last check in before 10pm.

Check out before 10am.

Checking in or out can be arranged outside these times if necessary, as we are always around working on the orchard.

Transport: We recommend that guests have their own form of transport for the duration of their stay with us. Please note that there is no public transport to our place. We are 3.8 km from the bus stop at the Katikati Information Centre. By prior arrangement we can offer a complimentary pick-up and drop-off service for arriving guests from the town centre.

Purple Hen Country Lodge is set in a special location which we aim to preserve. Consideration of other guests is expected always, so that everyone can enjoy their stay while at Purple Hen Country Lodge. After 10pm noise should be kept to a minimum.

Drug and Alcohol Policy: Alcohol may be consumed in moderation. Illegal drugs and drunken behaviour will not be tolerated.
